means: 马尔代夫（群岛）的，马尔代夫人的

sentence.Network_en: The picture shows the Maldivian Affairs Ministry Building.
sentence.Network_cn: 图为马尔代夫外交部大楼.

sentence.Network_en: The conversion to Islam , in 1153 AD , is a watershed in Maldivian history.
sentence.Network_cn: 公元 1153年 对于伊斯兰教的皈依是马尔代夫历史上的一个分水岭.

sentence.Network_en: This is why many Maldivian mosques are oriented towards the sun and not Mecca.
sentence.Network_cn: 而这正是很多马尔代夫清真寺全都朝向太阳而非麦加的原因所在.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 马尔代夫人的(maldivian), 此释义来源于网络辞典。
maldives 男工, maldivian 马尔代夫人, maldives 马尔代夫共和国

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Maldives

auth_sentence.content: But how can he when he stands accused of undermining Maldivian democracy?
auth_sentence.res_content: But how can he when he stands accused of undermining Maldivian democracy?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But how can he when he stands accused of undermining Maldivian democracy?

auth_sentence.content: "I don't want to hurt any Maldivian," Mr Nasheed said, urging all parties to adhere to democratic values and the constitution.
auth_sentence.res_content: "I don't want to hurt any Maldivian," Mr Nasheed said, urging all parties to adhere to democratic values and the constitution.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "I don't want to hurt any Maldivian," Mr Nasheed said, urging all parties to adhere to democratic values and the constitution.

auth_sentence.content: Mr Nasheed's Maldivian Democratic Party last night issued a statement saying that his resignation had been "involuntary".
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr Nasheed's Maldivian Democratic Party last night issued a statement saying that his resignation had been "involuntary".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr Nasheed's Maldivian Democratic Party last night issued a statement saying that his resignation had been "involuntary".
